mapper.select: select s1.shop_id, name sname, sub_title, original_price, promote_price, stock, cate_id, create_date,s2.shop_img_id,ss.content,ss.create_date from shop s1 LEFT JOIN shop_image s2 on s1.shop_id=s2.shop_id LEFT join review ss on s1.shop_id = ss.shop_id where s1.cate_id=#{cid} group by s1.shop_id

select s1.shop_id, name, sub_title, original_price, promote_price, stock, cate_id, create_date,s2.shop_img_id,ss.content,ss.create_date from shop s1 LEFT JOIN shop_image s2 on s1.shop_id=s2.shop_id LEFT join review ss on s1.shop_id = ss.shop_id where s1.name like '%${name}%' or s1.sub_title like '%${name}%' group by s1.shop_id
